notes
property.value:
World War 1 End of Empires
Map is based on Europe circa April 6th 1917, when the United States entered World War 1. Play as one of 8 nations: Germany, France, Russia, Austria-Hungary, Britain, Italy, or the United States. The Entente is made up of France, Russia, Britain, Italy, and the United States. The Central Powers are Germany, Austria-Hungary, and the Ottoman Empire.
